ygData.subject: Role call
ygData.msgSnippet: Bludgeon, KitKat s feeling better and wants a meeting,I ll explain more when the others arrive. Phobia smiles, it was good to finally see some organization

"Bludgeon, KitKat's feeling better and wants a meeting,I'll explain more
when the others arrive." Phobia smiles, it was good to finally see some
organization from this group.

Starscreem replied thats two things going well so far, once they had a plan
of attack Phobia'd relay it back to Starscreem and let the alliance join the
fun.

Dollen responded, that's three, and Goldeneye would surely follow four bots
to loyaly follow KitKat. "I figured you'd want to know the situation so I
arranged the little hitchhiker. KitKats still a little wobbly from her
injuries but other than that she's ready for action." Phobia couldn't lie
and say she's 100 percent, any bot that looked at her could tell that but
the effect wasn't permanent and she'd be at 100 percent by the time the
battle began.

KitKat and Drillbit made six brave warriors intene on destroying Megatron
with EXTREME prejudice.

Destructor was new around here, he didn't know all the rules yet, Phobia was
happy to explain. "Far as we know for sure the only one with Megatron is
Waspinator but there is a chance that there are other factors involved which
require strategic planning. KitKat saw Megatron associating with a bot named
Rowdy. This bot has associations with an alien race known as the Vok. We are
prepared to assault and if possible destroy Megatron." Phobia paused to let
the information sink in. "Then we will have the respect of the other
Predacons."

Phobia made eight. Eight on two sounded like good odds but there were always
ways to improve those odds and sideing with the alliance was just the way to
do it.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Alloran2@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 26, 2000 12:16 PM
Subject: The Efrafans


> :::The Efrafans/Bludegon:::
>
> ::A ship crashed down on Earth near the Predacon base.  It came from the
> Cybertronian colony Efrafa.  The colony was a military war Fortress::
> Woundwart: Campion, where are we?
> Campion: I believe we have crashed on prehistoric earth.
> Woundwart: Then we will assume alternate forms based on the lifeforms
here.
> Vervain, Cherval, put DNA scanners online.
> ::They scan for lifeforms and all get the beast modes of.... Rabbits!::
> Woundwart: These forms will have to do.
> ::They walk up to the base which i beleive is run by Blackarachnia and
> Rampage::
> Woundwart: We would like to join your group. Do you accept?
> --------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::He does what he is told and walked to the CR room::
> Bludgeon:  What is it Phobia?
>
>
>
>
